content: --गत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} produced in one's mind; °तो मनोरथः <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> (--तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} aside (to oneself) being considered to be spoken privately (<ab>opp.</ab> प्रकाशं aloud); frequently used as a stage-direction in dramas; it is the same as स्यगतं which is thus defined; अश्राव्यं खलु पद्वस्तु तदिह स्यगतं मतं <ls>S. D. 6.</ls>
